google_api.description: Google API utilizes Google to respond to a wide variety of questions.
google_api.input_template: Just the request in a string format

generative_lm.description: This service uses language models to generate responses.
generative_lm.input_template: Just the request in a string format

weather_api.description: The Weather API can provide current weather information for a given location.
weather_api.input_template: Just the request in a string format

news_api.description: The News API can provide trending news.
news_api.input_template: Just the request in a string format

wolframalpha_api.description: The WolframAlpha API can perform calculations and do math.
wolframalpha_api.input_template: Equation that needs to be solved. DON'T RETURN ANY TEXT. Examples: '5 + 2', '7 + 2x = 12 - 3x'

arxiv_api.description: arxiv API can search for latest articles on requested keyword.
arxiv_api.input_template: Return only the keyword that is needed to be searched for. E.g., 'ChatGPT', 'dialog systems'.
